attributes.description: The Volkswagen Tiguan 2.0TDI 4Motion R-Line is now available at Fourbuy. attributes.description: Full of thrill and excitement! Features include: Engine power output: 121kW/213Nm - Electronic power assist steering; 17 inch Alloy Wheels; Automatic On/Off LED headlamps; LED Front fog lights; Auto headlamp levelling; Front rain-sensing wipers; Advanced keyless push-button engine start; 6 Airbags SRS: Front (driver and passenger, side and curtain); Hill Launch Assist (HLA); Anti-lock Braking System (ABS); Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD); Emergency Brake Assist (EBA); Electronic Park Brake (EPB); Dynamic Stability Control (DSC); G-Vectoring Control (GVC) Plus; Power windows with one-touch system (front and rear); Cloth seat trim. Height adjustable seat – Driver; 40:20:40 folding rear seats; Rear centre armrest with 2 USB ports and cupholders; Dual-zone climate control Aircon; Cruise control; Leather-wrapped Multifunctional steering wheel with audio controls and cruise control; Tilt and telescopic adjustable steering wheel; Front centre console armrest; Leather-wrapped gear shift knob; Reverse Camera; Auto door lock; MZD Connect system 7-Inch display screen and CD player/AUX jack/2 USB ports; 6 Speakers; Bluetooth® handsfree connection; Internet radio integration (Pandora®, Sticher and AHA); Commander dial; Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™; Remote central locking; ISOFIX. EURO NCAP 5-STAR SAFETY RATING The vehicle has a 3 year / unlimited mileage Warranty 3 year / unlimited mileage Service Plan as well as Roadside Assistance.
